Function.Description: The symbol function converts a String or Text argument into a Symbol object.

Brief.Overview: The symbol Function converts the specified source {source} argument into a a new Symbol object . Normally this function is used to create a symbol from a source string, since Symbols can be easily used as identifiers and strings are not easily used as identifiers.
Brief.Usage: The symbol function is used to coerce an object into a symbol.

Argument.Name: string
Argument.Note: A String argument containing only the characters allowed in a Symbol

Syntax.Return: A Symbol constructed from the string argument
